description: Generate a quest for an RPG game using game context to anchor the LLM

input_variables.name: game_context
input_variables.description: The context of the game (NPCs, items, existing quests...)

input_variables.name: genre
input_variables.description: The genre of the RPG game (e.g., fantasy, sci-fi, etc.)

input_variables.name: difficulty
input_variables.description: The difficulty level of the quest (easy, medium, hard)
